verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to <S%H740>Ariel,<s%> to <S%H740>Ariel,<s%> the <S%H7151>city<s%> where <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2583>dwelt!<s%> <S%H5595>add<s%> ye <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> <S%H8141>year;<s%> let them <S%H5362>kill<s%> <S%H2282>sacrifices.<s%>
Yet I will <S%H6693>distress<s%> <S%H740>Ariel,<s%> and there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8386>heaviness<s%> and <S%H592>sorrow:<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> unto me as <S%H740>Ariel.<s%>

And I will <S%H2583>camp<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee round <S%H1754>about,<s%> and will lay <S%H6696>siege<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee with a <S%H4674>mount,<s%> and I will <S%H6965>raise<s%> <S%H4694>forts<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee.

And thou shalt be brought <S%H8213>down,<s%> and shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> out of the <S%H4480>ground,<s%> <S%H776><s%> and thy <S%H565>speech<s%> shall be <S%H7817>low<s%> out of the <S%H4480>dust,<s%> <S%H6083><s%> and thy <S%H6963>voice<s%> shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> as of one that hath a familiar <S%H178>spirit,<s%> out of the <S%H4480>ground,<s%> <S%H776><s%> and thy <S%H565>speech<s%> shall <S%H6850>whisper<s%> out of the <S%H4480>dust.<s%> <S%H6083><s%>

Moreover the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of thy <S%H2114>strangers<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> like <S%H1851>small<s%> <S%H80>dust,<s%> and the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of the terrible <S%H6184>ones<s%> shall be as <S%H4671>chaff<s%> that passeth <S%H5674>away:<s%> yea, it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> at an <S%H6621>instant<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly.<s%>

Thou shalt be <S%H6485>visited<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5973><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> with <S%H7482>thunder,<s%> and with <S%H7494>earthquake,<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6963>noise,<s%> with <S%H5492>storm<s%> and <S%H5591>tempest,<s%> and the <S%H3851>flame<s%> of <S%H398>devouring<s%> <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H6633>fight<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H740>Ariel,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H6633>fight<s%> against her and her <S%H4685>munition,<s%> and that <S%H6693>distress<s%> her, shall <S%H1961>be<s%> as a <S%H2472>dream<s%> of a <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H2377>vision.<s%>

It shall even <S%H1961>be<s%> as <S%H834>when<s%> a <S%H7457>hungry<s%> man <S%H2492>dreameth,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he <S%H398>eateth;<s%> but he <S%H6974>awaketh,<s%> and his <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H7386>empty:<s%> or as <S%H834>when<s%> a thirsty <S%H6771>man<s%> <S%H2492>dreameth,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he <S%H8354>drinketh;<s%> but he <S%H6974>awaketh,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he is <S%H5889>faint,<s%> and his <S%H5315>soul<s%> hath <S%H8264>appetite:<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H1961>be,<s%> that <S%H6633>fight<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

Stay <S%H4102>yourselves,<s%> and <S%H8539>wonder;<s%> cry ye <S%H8173>out,<s%> and <S%H8173>cry:<s%> they are <S%H7937>drunken,<s%> but <S%H3808>not<s%> with <S%H3196>wine;<s%> they <S%H5128>stagger,<s%> but <S%H3808>not<s%> with strong <S%H7941>drink.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath poured <S%H5258>out<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of deep <S%H8639>sleep,<s%> and hath <S%H6105>closed<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> and your <S%H7218>rulers,<s%> the <S%H2374>seers<s%> hath he <S%H3680>covered.<s%>

And the <S%H2380>vision<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> is <S%H1961>become<s%> unto you as the <S%H1697>words<s%> of a <S%H5612>book<s%> that is <S%H2856>sealed,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> men <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> one that is <S%H3045>learned,<s%> <S%H5612><s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7121>Read<s%> <S%H2088>this,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee:<s%> and he <S%H559>saith,<s%> I <S%H3201>cannot;<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is sealed: <S%H2856><s%>

And the <S%H5612>book<s%> is <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> him <S%H834>that<s%> is not <S%H3045>learned,<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5612><s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7121>Read<s%> <S%H2088>this,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee:<s%> and he <S%H559>saith,<s%> I am not <S%H3045>learned.<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5612><s%>

Wherefore the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3282>Forasmuch<s%> <S%H3588><s%> as <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> draw <S%H5066>near<s%> me with their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and with their <S%H8193>lips<s%> do <S%H3513>honor<s%> me, but have removed their heart <S%H7368>far<s%> <S%H3820><s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me, and their <S%H3374>fear<s%> <S%H854>toward<s%> me <S%H1961>is<s%> <S%H3925>taught<s%> by the <S%H4687>precept<s%> of men: <S%H376><s%>

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H3254>proceed<s%> to do a marvelous <S%H6381>work<s%> <S%H854>among<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> even a marvelous <S%H6381>work<s%> and a <S%H6382>wonder:<s%> for the <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of their <S%H2450>wise<s%> men shall <S%H6>perish,<s%> and the <S%H998>understanding<s%> of their <S%H995>prudent<s%> men shall be <S%H5641>hid.<s%>

Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto them that seek <S%H6009>deep<s%> to <S%H5641>hide<s%> their <S%H6098>counsel<s%> from the <S%H4480>LORD,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> and their <S%H4639>works<s%> <S%H1961>are<s%> in the <S%H4285>dark,<s%> and they <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> <S%H7200>seeth<s%> us? and <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> us?

Surely <S%H518><s%> your turning of things upside <S%H2017>down<s%> shall be <S%H2803>esteemed<s%> as the <S%H3335>potter's<s%> <S%H2563>clay:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> shall the <S%H4639>work<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> of him that <S%H6213>made<s%> it, He <S%H6213>made<s%> me <S%H3808>not?<s%> or shall the thing <S%H3336>framed<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> of him that <S%H3335>framed<s%> it, He had no <S%H995>understanding?<s%> <S%H3808><s%>

Is it <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> a <S%H4213>very<s%> little <S%H4592>while,<s%> and <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> shall be <S%H7725>turned<s%> into a fruitful <S%H3759>field,<s%> and the fruitful <S%H3759>field<s%> shall be <S%H2803>esteemed<s%> as a <S%H3293>forest?<s%>

And in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall the <S%H2795>deaf<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>book,<s%> and the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H5787>blind<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> out of <S%H4480>obscurity,<s%> <S%H652><s%> and out of <S%H4480>darkness.<s%> <S%H2822><s%>

The <S%H6035>meek<s%> also shall <S%H3254>increase<s%> their <S%H8057>joy<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H34>poor<s%> among <S%H120>men<s%> shall <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the terrible <S%H6184>one<s%> is brought to <S%H656>naught,<s%> and the <S%H3887>scorner<s%> is <S%H3615>consumed,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H8245>watch<s%> for <S%H205>iniquity<s%> are cut off: <S%H3772><s%>

That make a man an <S%H2398>offender<s%> <S%H120><s%> for a <S%H1697>word,<s%> and lay a <S%H6983>snare<s%> for him that <S%H3198>reproveth<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and turn <S%H5186>aside<s%> the <S%H6662>just<s%> for a thing of <S%H8414>naught.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> wax <S%H2357>pale.<s%>

But <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H7200>seeth<s%> his <S%H3206>children,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of mine <S%H3027>hands,<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of him, they shall <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> my <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H853><s%> the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and shall <S%H6206>fear<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
They also that <S%H8582>erred<s%> in <S%H7307>spirit<s%> shall <S%H3045>come<s%> to <S%H998>understanding,<s%> and they that <S%H7279>murmured<s%> shall <S%H3925>learn<s%> <S%H3948>doctrine.<s%>
